channel.title: How do you give items member requirments?
channel.description: Well iv'e googled it and searched on forums and i honestly couldn't find anything. I just want to incorporate this useful thing into my new member's area. So How do i giveitems member requirments. Ex. "You need to be a member to equip this item" If the player isnt a member.

item.title: How do you give items member requirments?
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:

[quote=“mLexus, post:2, topic:224594”]if member = 0 {
u need member to be dis
} else {
dourthing
}[/quote]

I class that as spam, that means absolutely nothing!

item.title: How do you give items member requirments?
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

[quote=“Zach 93, post:7, topic:224594”]Yes, in the client. Then declare a new variable for handling membership:

public boolean playerIsMember;

To make someone members, change playerIsMember to true.[/quote]

ur clevar
can u help me and mak vid on makin ppl owner?

item.title: How do you give items member requirments?
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

Yes, in the client. Then declare a new variable for handling membership:

public boolean playerIsMember;

To make someone members, change playerIsMember to true.

item.source: How do you give items member requirments?

item.title: How do you give items member requirments?
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

Add:

public int[] membersItems = {4151, 4153, 6570}; //Add more members items here.
public boolean isMembersItem(int item) {
	for (int i : membersItems) {
		if (membersItems[i] == item) return true;
	}
	return false;
}

Then you’ll have to make a membership variable, and save it to the char files.

Then, in public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot), add:

if (isMembersItem(wearID)) && !playerIsMember) {
	sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item.");
}

playerIsMember being the variable you saved membership as to the character file.

Read full topic
